MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL16 postcode area of Denbigh, affecting properties in Machno Place. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs needed and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:13pm on 9th December 2020
